about_the_game:
This magical land has been swamped by darkness and horrible creatures.
The Kingdom is defenseless since the enemy captured the girls in charge of protecting it!
Rescue them one by one, and you’ll be thanked generously ~



They are waiting for you…






The Princess
A young princess determined to get the Kingdom of Faelestra back!
She'll welcome you with open arms and ask you to join her mission to rescue her allies, who have been captured by dark creatures.
A little bit inexperienced, but ready to learn fast and reward you for your hard work.


The Sorceress
A magical and enchanting elf from a long lineage of sorcerers. Her light is desired by many, but she’s only willing to give it to the one that helps her escape!


The Wizard
A scholar of magic, she spent her life studying to become a great Wizard. Save her and let her do some more studies on you!


The Druid
An elf from the forests, one with nature. Help her free her land so she can show you all the aphrodisiac elixirs and swings of vine that surround the kingdom!


The Knight
A brave and loyal fighter, fallen in combat but staying strong against her captors. Her toned body is ready for a fight and more. Run to her aid!



Play your cards well to slay your enemies and get to the end of the quest.Attack ferociously as a fighter, use spells as a sorcerer, or quickly finish them all as a rogue.

Discover the Kingdom of Faelestra

Explore the deep dungeons and the magical world of Faelestra with the companion of your
choice and experience encounters you will never forget.

Improve your deck

You decide how your deck is! Find traders and improve your deck with a bunch of
cards featuring sexy illustrations.

Enjoy high-quality scenes!

High-quality 3D environments, a wide variety of illustrations, and animations that
will fulfill your fetishes and unleash your lust!

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 18.
This game adult content including full nudity, sexual scenes, anal sex. Please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.

name: Spire of Lust & Fetish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
